altIdentifier.idno: Not Morley Handwwritten Cat. 154A, as stated in Codrington but No 154. The second copy (Codrington/Reade No 214) is only briefly noted in pencil under 154.

author.persName: Muhammad Husain b. Khalaf al-Tabrizi, called Burhan.

msItem.title: Burhan-i Qati'.
msItem.note: (Varies from the usual one) F1a: a) Note of ownership or purchase by Mir Hasan. b) Stamp, the name filled in ink: Presented to the ROYAL ASIATIC SOCIETY by John Romer Esq. Back flyleaf, verso: pasted in page: List of officers 'of the 9th and who have been posted to it since I have - Casualties 1/5th in three years.
msItem.incipit: Ay burdah zaban-ha hamah bi-nam-i tu rah

listBibl.bibl: For the provenance see Donations Register for November 18 1848.

bindingDesc.p: Brown leather Indian binding with blind-stamped decoration.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
